title: Inventory Management Software
description: Developed application with features including product creation and categorisation, stock creation, location and store creation and order management.

title: GPT Powered Chatbot
description: Created a chatbot in the form of a Google Chrome extension that summarises a Google Meet for the users. The chatbot is powered by OpenAI's GPT 3 and uses libraries like Llama Index and Langchain. The chatbot is trained on the transcript of the Google Meet recording and answers the user's questions in the context of the meeting.
